M

main(String[]) - Static method in class info.kgeorgiy.ja.bondarev.implementor.Implementor
The main function is used to generate a jar file with the implementation of the passed descriptor.It takes the string name of the interface descriptor and the path of the jar file and calls the Implementor.implementJar(Class, Path) method.

T

tryCreateDirectories(Path) - Static method in class info.kgeorgiy.ja.bondarev.implementor.Implementor
Creates the parent directories of the given path. if the passed path is a root function does nothing else it calls the Files.createDirectory(Path, FileAttribute[]) method on the passed path's parent.
